page.title: 06Religions and Churches
page.content: There are 4 churches in the area; St. Mary's Church Benhall; St. Mary's Church Sternfield; and St. John's Church Saxmundham. These are all Church of England Churches. There is also a non-conformist church in Saxmundham, the United Reformed Church, and a Salvation Army Hall. The Rector of St. John's Church told us he held 3 Sunday services, on an average 14 people attend the 8.00 a.m. service, 130 the 11.00 a.m. service and 57 the evening service. The average weekly collection is one hundred and sixty eight pounds.A service is held at the old peoples' flats at Swann House once a month. The choir meets on Friday's and the bell ringers practice on Thursday's.The Rector is helped to run the Church by Church Wardens, six elders, and a Parocial Church Council.
